name: VTM - Heartless Lullaby
description:
Delve into the World of Darkness as Zak Riley, a young man in his twenties, and Diane, young childe of the Toreador Primogen, drawn into a dark plot with the Heartless Club in the middle.

Make your way through the disco, get to know dozens of different characters & take a peek into this love-letter to games like Disco Elysium, Wastelands 2 and the IP that has been a part of our lives for the past 30 years.  

Using the Role-Playing System from Vampire: The Masquerade 5th Edition, take your chances, roll the dices, and assume the (sometimes-dire) consequences of your actions. 

Covering just the prologue of the story, with well over an hour and a half of gameplay and several different endings, Vampire: The Masquerade - Heartless Lullaby was created in less than a month in celebration of the Vampire: The Masquerade Jam.
